column1: List of countries where companies have adopted REITs or REIT equivalent structures and are eligible to be classified in one of the REIT Sub-Industries
Updated in GICS definitions in February 2025

column3: Property Trust, A-REIT (formerly known as Listed Property Trust)
SICAFI (Société d’ Investissement a Capital Fixe Immobilière), B-REIT
Specialised Investment Fund (SIF), Reserved Alternative Investment Fund (RAIF)
FIBRA (Fideicomiso de Infraestructura y Bienes Raices)
Listed Property Vehicle, Real Estate Investment Fund
Real Estate Investment and Asset Management Company (Sociedades de Investimento e Gestão Imobiliária) or SIGI
SOCIMI (Sociedades Anonimas Cotizadas de Inversion en el Mercado Inmobiliario)
REIC (Real Estate Investment Company), Gayrimenkul Yatirim Ortakligi
